00175       //  return type_i*(nBins()+2) + bin_index+kNHistogram1DDoubles;

00183 
00184   inline void Profile1D::fill(Float_t x_value, Double_t value, Double_t weight)
00185 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00186     throw(std::range_error)
00187 #endif
00188   {
00189     UInt_t bin_index=binIndex(x_value);
00190 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00191     assert ( !isCalculated(bin_index) );
00192 #endif
00193     addToBinContent(kSum, bin_index,value);
00194     addToBinContent(kSum2, bin_index,value*value);
00195     addToBinContent(kWeightSum, bin_index,weight);
00196     if (value>max(bin_index)) setBinContent(kMax, bin_index,value);
00197     if (value<min(bin_index)) setBinContent(kMin,bin_index,value);
00198     addToEntries(weight);
00199   }
00200 
00201   inline Double_t Profile1D::sum(UInt_t bin_index) const
00202 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00203     throw(std::range_error)
00204 #endif
00205   {
00206     if (isCalculated(bin_index)) return binContent(kSum,bin_index)*sumOfWeights(bin_index);
00207     else return binContent(kSum,bin_index);
00208   }
00209 
00210 
00211   inline Double_t Profile1D::mean(UInt_t bin_index) const
00212 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00213     throw(std::range_error)
00214 #endif
00215   {
00216     // check whether the mean value has been calculated in is stored in the bin?
00217     if (!isCalculated(bin_index)) return ( sumOfWeights(bin_index) >0. ? binContent(kSum,bin_index)/sumOfWeights(bin_index) : binContent(kSum,bin_index) ) ;
00218     else return binContent(kSum,bin_index);
00219   }
00220 
00221   inline Double_t Profile1D::rms(UInt_t bin_index) const
00222 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00223     throw(std::range_error)
00224 #endif
00225   {
00226     // check whether the mean value has been calculated in is stored in the bin?
00227     if (!isCalculated(bin_index)) {
00228       if (sumOfWeights(bin_index)>1.) {
00229         return sqrt((binContent(kSum2,bin_index)-binContent(kSum,bin_index)*binContent(kSum,bin_index)/sumOfWeights(bin_index))/(sumOfWeights(bin_index)-1.));
00230       }
00231       else if (sumOfWeights(bin_index)>0) {
00232         return sqrt((binContent(kSum2,bin_index)-binContent(kSum,bin_index)*binContent(kSum,bin_index)/sumOfWeights(bin_index))/(sumOfWeights(bin_index)));
00233       }
00234       else {
00235         return 0.;
00236       }
00237     }
00238     else return binContent(kSum2,bin_index);
00239   }
00240 
00241   inline Double_t Profile1D::min(UInt_t bin_index) const
00242 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00243     throw(std::range_error)
00244 #endif
00245   {
00246     return binContent(kMin,bin_index);
00247   }
00248 
00249   inline Double_t Profile1D::max(UInt_t bin_index) const
00250 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00251     throw(std::range_error)
00252 #endif
00253   {
00254     return binContent(kMax,bin_index);
00255   }
00256 
00257   inline Double_t Profile1D::sumOfWeights(UInt_t bin_index) const
00258 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00259     throw(std::range_error)
00260 #endif
00261   {
00262     return fabs(binContent(kWeightSum,bin_index));
00263   }
00264 
00265   inline bool Profile1D::isCalculated(UInt_t bin_index) const {
00266     return (binContent(kWeightSum,bin_index)<=0.);
00267   }

00272 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00273   inline void Profile1D::rangeCheck(UInt_t bin_index) const
00274     throw(std::range_error)
00275   {
00276     if ( bin_index + kNHistogram1DDoubles >= (UInt_t) _obj->getNDouble() ) {
00277       std::stringstream message;
00278       message << "Range error accessing bin " << bin_index << " of histogram " << id() << "which has" << nBins() << ".";
00279       throw std::range_error(message.str());
00280     }
00281   }
00282 #endif
00283 
00284   inline void Profile1D::addToBinContent(UInt_t type_i, UInt_t bin_index, Double_t value)
00285 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00286     throw(std::range_error)
00287 #endif
00288   {
00289 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00290     rangeCheck(bin_index);
00291 #endif
00292     UInt_t value_index=getValueIndex(type_i,bin_index);
00293     _obj->setDoubleVal(value_index, _obj->getDoubleVal(value_index)+value );
00294   }
00295 
00296   inline void Profile1D::setBinContent(UInt_t type_i, UInt_t bin_index, Double_t value)
00297 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00298     throw(std::range_error)
00299 #endif
00300   {
00301 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00302     rangeCheck(bin_index);
00303 #endif
00304     _obj->setDoubleVal(getValueIndex(type_i,bin_index),value);
00305   }
00306 
00307   inline double Profile1D::binContent(UInt_t type_i, UInt_t bin_index) const
00308 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00309     throw(std::range_error)
00310 #endif
00311   {
00312 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00313     rangeCheck(bin_index);
00314 #endif
00315     return _obj->getDoubleVal(getValueIndex(type_i,bin_index));
00316   }
